text: The Blossoms were a popular girl group from California. It rose to fame during the 1960s. They sang R&B;, pop and rock. The group had many hit songs and records. Darlene Love often sang with them. The prominent members of the group were Fanita James, Gloria Jones, Darlene Love, Jean King and Annette Williams. The Blossoms broke up in 1990. Category:American girl groups Category:American musical groups Category:1990 disestablishments in the United States Category:Musical groups disestablished in 1990
title: The Blossoms
